methods.full_signature: @RequestMapping(value = "/emrHadoopJarSteps", method = RequestMethod.POST, consumes = {"application/xml", "application/json"}) @Secured(SecurityFunctions.FN_EMR_HADOOP_JAR_STEPS_POST) public EmrHadoopJarStep addHadoopJarStepToEmrCluster(@RequestBody EmrHadoopJarStepAddRequest request)
